title: Systems Engineer
description:
- Contributed to the Australian Defence Air Traffic System (ADATS) project under a systems architect, working on a large-scale, fast-paced defense program and exploring cross-team opportunities (space and electronic warfare projects).
- Created macros to automate tasks in Cameo Systems Modeler, saving colleagues ~2-3 hours per weekly report. Began developing a program to transfer system requirements from PDF documents into requirements management software automatically.
- Hold Australian Export/Import (EXIM) and Baseline security clearances; NV1 (Secret) clearance in progress.

title: Academic Tutor (MECH5720 Sensors and Signals)
description: - Led lab and tutorial sessions for a senior engineering course on signal processing, sensor technologies, environmental effects on sensing, and advanced topics like object tracking and synthetic aperture radar.

title: Blockchain Development Intern
description:
- Developed and tested smart contracts in Teal (assembly-like language) and JavaScript for Yieldly (a DeFi and esports platform), contributing to three successful independent security audits of the contracts.
- Worked on NFT minting, metadata handling, distribution, and strategy at Yesports (an esports NFT startup), coding smart contracts in Solidity and integrating with JavaScript front-ends.
- Oversaw the launch of collaborative NFT collections with multiple esports teams (e.g. Talon, BOOM), reaching a combined audience of over 30 million and driving significant user engagement.
